General.Name: DAE-IL Corporation
General.Description: DAE-IL Corporation manufactures and sells powertrain systems for automobiles, motorcycles, and heavy equipment in South Korea and internationally. It offers car transmission and engine gears; trans and drive axles, and transmission and excavator products; and motorcycle transmission and engine products, as well as production and measurement systems. The company also manufactures electric automobiles, motorcycles, and trucks. In addition, it exports its products. DAE-IL Corporation was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
